phrases: It is right here for sure!
Compared to that heart, you are nothing!
The idea that I am being cornered like this...
This has to be a dream.
The battle had already begun while we were waiting.
There is a chance of an explosion from a gas leak!
It is dangerous, so please get back!
An ambulance is on its way.
You are going to be all right.
Do not let that lady near Kira!
We will get you treated at the hospital right away.
That lady's been turned into a bomb!
Can you see how many fingers I am holding up?
Jotaro, we need your Star Platinum.
But it is no use unless I can get closer.
Even if I stop time, we are too far away,
and I cannot do anything to him.
I have to get at least five meters closer.
You turned someone into a bomb and took them hostage?
I will fix her right up in a heartbeat!
It is not as simple as taking a hostage!
He is got a hidden ability!
It is an ability called Bites the Dust, and it can blow away time!
Episode 39 Goodbye, Morioh The Heart of Gold
It must only work on people who are not Stand users, like me or that lady,
and occurs coincidentally whenever Kira is in trouble.
Which means, when he is in despair like this, this ability activates
and becomes a bomb that can turn back time one hour!
The knuckles and skin on your hand are so soft...
You have such cute, white fingers...
Rubbing my cheek calms me down so much...
You have heard of Leonardo da Vinci's Mona Lisa, right?
When I saw that painting in an art book...
I do not know how to put it...
Um, this is a bit dirty, but...
Everything About Leonardo da Vinci's World
I just cut out the part with her hands
and hung it in my room for a while.
I want to cut off yours, too.
I have killed 48 women with beautiful hands up to now.
You are the only one who will know my identity!
Bites the Dust is about to start!
If we do not defeat him now,
everyone here but that lady will be blown away!
Are you coming for me, Jotaro?
Bites the Dust was created because I did not want to run into you!
How long will you be able to stop it?
Just try to corner me more!
Pushing me to the limit again will make Bites the Dust appear!
Do not let him push Killer Queen's switch!
I was able to have Bites the Dust take effect again!
The birds came from behind me and...
Come to think of it, this is not the way I usually take to work...
But if Bites the Dust did turn back time one hour,
I should be on my way to work now...
What time is it right now?
I had put my watch in my chest pocket.
Bites the Dust did go into effect again!
The watch that Hayato broke with Stray Cat should have returned to normal, too!
So the Kosaku Kawajiri that Rohan took a picture of was Yoshikage Kira...
And it is finally over, is not it?
They finally cornered you, Yoshikage Kira.
Well, I guess that is no surprise.
Something very traumatic must have happened.
Something so traumatic that you do not even realize what happened to you.
Are you a new Stand user?!
I will make you realize that you are already dead!
This is not any Stand ability!
This is proof that all that is here is the completely black soul of a dead killer!
Do you remember how you died now?
Even if I stop time right now, I am too far away from him.
Do not let him push the switch!
He is now within five meters!
Koichi, you truly are a reliable guy.
I am truly thankful that I came to this town and met you.
Time has begun to move again.
I will push it... I am going to push it...
Bites the Dust will go into effect again...
He just suddenly went flying back!
I am going to push it...
I-I am going to push it...
I am going to push the switch right now...
I know he is our enemy, but he really is something.
Someone is on the ground back here!
A guy's been run over by an ambulance!
I did not realize he was there!
Are you one of the injured, too?
It was like he dove under there himself.
I am not trying to make excuses, but I did not have a chance to restrain him.
His head was caught between the tire and the road...
The skin on his face has been ripped off.
Do you happen to know the identity of the deceased?
He said that his name was Yoshikage Kira.
There is a family by the name of Kira in Kotodai that goes back generations.
I heard its only current member lives alone, so he might not have any family...
His demise was due to an accidental death.
But this is how it should be.
There would be no way to punish him in court.
But my dad was murdered by him.
I wanted someone to punish him.
It looks like you remember, Yoshikage Kira...
It looks like you remember now!
Fifteen years ago, you did not have a Stand ability,
so you could not make corpses disappear.
That is why, when I died, it was in all the papers.
Do you remember this wound on my back?
Or, since it was your first murder, you forgot to take my hand,
so perhaps I was not as memorable?!
I believe your name was Reimi Sugimoto...
What the hell have you been doing here for fifteen years?!
Why would you go to the trouble of showing me
the wound on your back and telling me who you are?
This would not be the place where you are not supposed to turn around, is it?
My father told me that there was a road in this town where spirits of the dead walk,
and if you were to find yourself there, you must not turn around.
If you were to turn around, an uncontrollable power
the wound on your back so I would end up in front of you,
forcing me to turn around, were you?
You were not trying to trick me, were you?
Let us have you turn around.
I would like to see what would happen.
that I did not expect you to try to do this to me?
We have been waiting fifteen years for you to come here...
Now, let us have you punished, Yoshikage Kira.
Wh-Where are they going to take me?
I am sure it is somewhere you will not be able to rest in peace.
It would not hurt if you stayed a little longer, would it?
It feels like this town's losing its guardian angel...
It makes me uneasy, knowing that you are leaving.
But there is nothing left for us to do in this town.
The time has come for us to leave this town.
Are you going to cry when I leave
because you will miss me, Rohan?
You already died fifteen years ago.
I said this before, but I still believe that ghosts should give up
whatever attachments they have left here, and just hurry up and pass on.
Since this is the last time, I will be honest!
Of course I do not want you to go!
So it is finally over, Reimi.
We came to see you off.
I know it is strange to say this to a dead person, but take care.
I am going to miss you, too.
You are a wonderful young lady.
Because of you, this town was saved!
But I believe we all saved Morioh together.
I am sure that no one here will ever forget you.
I wonder if he had to work overtime.
You go on and eat before it gets cold.
I will eat when your father gets home.
By the way, have you gotten a little taller lately?
Our town, Morioh, was deeply hurt.
The town was hurt by the monster named Yoshikage Kira
that this town itself had created.
I am sure that Hayato's mom
will forever be waiting for her husband to return.
Shigechi's parents will forever be waiting for him to return.
The families of the daughters and sisters killed by Yoshikage Kira
will forever be waiting for their return.
The pain of their wounds will now only get deeper.
How can we try to ease this pain?
Will it be life-threatening for this town's future, or will it eventually disappear?
After watching Josuke and the others get involved in this incident in Morioh,
there is one thing that I can say...
That the young people in this town have hearts of gold.
The same hearts of gold shining with justice
that we saw when we headed to Egypt.
I saw that within Josuke and the others...
As long as they have that, they will be fine.
We will not have to worry about this town any longer.
Cannot you hear me, Old Man?
I guess I should say goodbye to the son I am so proud of.
The picture of my mom that I just gave you...
I put it in my wallet, just as you asked.
I am leaving without seeing your mother, but I wish her nothing but happiness.
So you put it in your wallet...
This is the edge of that picture.
A dad should give his son an allowance, right?
Not to mention, if you take that picture back home,
your old lady's going to get mad at you again!
You going to take back what you said about him having a heart of gold, old man?
The invisible baby's mother was never found,
and the baby ended up being adopted by Joseph Joestar.
Jotaro Kujo got his doctorate from a thesis he wrote
while he was here about a starfish he saw on the beach.
He ate the snack I was saving for myself again!
I am going to drink his juice.
I was late because I was making us lunch.
I cannot wait to eat it.
You might be able to turn back to normal, Dad!
Even I look so much more beautiful that I do not know what
I am going to do with myself.
I look forward to your next visit.
I just saw Ko holding hands with a really pretty girl!
He has not told me anything!
Did you hear about Mr. Kira who went missing?
You mean how he turned up as a faceless corpse, right?
What are you going to do about it?
I am telling you that juice sprayed out from the can
you kicked and got all over my manga!
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten.
Is it really so interesting to look at the town all the time?
And so, for most people, the summer of 1999 passed like any other summer.
Apparently, Rohan was caught shoplifting at Kame Yu.
That is insane if it is true.
Yeah, but I am not really sure.
